description: An essential mountain focused feature set with updated styling make this a classic waterproof for a technically savvy mountain hiker. Waterproofing is provided by Pertex Shield 2.5 Layer with a recycled face with a fluorocarbon free DWR.
name: Rab Downpour Plus 2.0 Jacket - Mens

specs.value: Recycled 40D polyamide 2.5 L with PU membrane
